selections.name: Izzy's Monster
selections.reason: Proven mudder with a win on sloppy track last out (Jan 10). Speed figure of 83 is competitive and fits the conditions perfectly.

selections.name: Madison Rae
selections.reason: Consistent speed figures (87, 70, 76) and drops from tougher company. Should handle the wet track.

selections.name: Berlaine
selections.reason: Solid recent form with figures in the 80s. A reliable underneath contender.

danger_horse.name: Madison Rae
danger_horse.reason: Classy runner who could wake up in this spot.

selections.name: De' Ans Eighty
selections.reason: Standout on speed figures (87, 83, 83). Drops to a very winnable level. The one to beat.

selections.name: Sally's Suprise
selections.reason: Consistent mid-70s speed figures. Should be the main threat to the favorite.

selections.name: Gold Plus
selections.reason: Recent winner with a 77 speed figure. Good form cycle.

danger_horse.name: Sally's Suprise
danger_horse.reason: Consistent runner who picks up pieces if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Global Honor
selections.reason: Ran a strong 85 speed figure on dirt Jan 4. Proven ability to handle the surface switch.

selections.name: Victory Prince
selections.reason: Finished just behind Global Honor last time with an 84 figure. Logical contender.

selections.name: Clearly Artemus
selections.reason: Has some dirt experience (69 figure). Best of the rest in a scratched-down field.

danger_horse.name: Victory Prince
danger_horse.reason: Very evenly matched with the top selection.

selections.name: Huck's Agenda
selections.reason: Most consistent figures (67, 57) in a field of maidens. Good recent 2nd place finish.

selections.name: Belle Of Liberty
selections.reason: Flashy 69 figure back in October shows potential, but erratic form (22 figure recently). High ceiling, low floor.

selections.name: On Ramp
selections.reason: Debuted with a respectable 58. likely to improve.

danger_horse.name: Belle Of Liberty
danger_horse.reason: If she runs back to her October race, she wins easily.

selections.name: Roar Of Silence
selections.reason: Off-turf beneficiary. Ran a huge 90 speed figure on dirt recently. Looks best in this decimated field.

selections.name: Miss River Rat
selections.reason: Solid dirt form (79, 89). Handles wet tracks well.

selections.name: Star Anise
selections.reason: Consistent turf runner who might transfer form, but clearly behind the top two on dirt numbers.

selections.name: A Hint Of Scandal
selections.reason: Dominant speed figures (85) compared to the field. Looks like a single.

selections.name: Alotlikechocolate
selections.reason: Best of the rest with a recent 65 figure. Should pick up the pieces.

selections.name: Playboy Rocket
selections.reason: Recent 63 figure puts him in the mix for exotics.

danger_horse.name: None
danger_horse.reason: Field looks weak behind the favorite.

selections.name: Denizen
selections.reason: Superior dirt form with a recent 89 speed figure. Clearly the horse to beat on this surface change.

selections.name: Got Stripes
selections.reason: Has run decent figures on dirt (67). Logical second choice.

selections.name: Max S
selections.reason: Consistent mid-60s figures on dirt. Exotic filler.

danger_horse.name: Got Stripes
danger_horse.reason: Could improve on the off track.

selections.name: Western Avenue
selections.reason: Drops to bottom claiming level ($5k). Has back class with a 90 speed figure on dirt. Dangerous at this level.

selections.name: Flipping Fish
selections.reason: Most consistent recent dirt form (82, 71). Reliable veteran.

selections.name: Treaty
selections.reason: Has a big 92 figure on dirt from last year. If he finds that form, he wins.

danger_horse.name: Flipping Fish
danger_horse.reason: Consistency is key in low level claimers.
